summary: This is a very basic follower with no real dialouge or anything
descriptionHtml:
this is my follower that I had made for Derok's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47888/?]Ulfhednar[/url] race. he is a basic follower, and a blank slate I might update him if I learn how to mod.

he is naked when you find him this is so you can equip whatever armor or lack there of that you want to him.

I made this mod because of something that annoyed me with most race mods that I looked at, it was that few had any npcs added. of course now I realize just a little more how tedious it is but I've still yet to learn much about making mods.

he can be found in the bannered mare in whiterun.
author: Mrc3man
